instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A2179: What is A2179? A2179 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2020 with EMC 3302, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01958..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2179</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> water damaged
threads.message:
Hi Folks

<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2179</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Water/liquid damage

was told by client got coffee on touchpad

Now touchpad doesnt work

When opened and looked damage around this area

But no touchpad at all

Stuck on apple logo

Fan sounds like its running a race

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2179</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> water damaged
threads.message:
Fan goes high if a temperature sensor is triggered, or battery is not detected.

Clean affected areas, check all components and resolder them.
Also inspect audio board/flex for corrosion (both sides).
